bug.author: Oceania2018
bug.description:
When allocate a new variable like W = tf.Variable(1.0, name="weight"), the default _graph_key should be filled with grap-key-0/. But in the TensorFlowNET.Examples LinearRegression, it's empty.
<denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/1705364/50977506-1166d280-14b8-11e9-9ad7-8faf17bab3d5.png></denchmark-link>
<denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/1705364/50977774-981baf80-14b8-11e9-804e-ef24364638ba.png></denchmark-link>

comments.comment: for traceability add the file location src\TensorFlowNET.Core\Variables\RefVariable.cs
